scripts.test:ci: npm t && npm run build-storybook && STORYBOOK_STATIC=true jest --config=visual.jest.config.js
scripts.test:visual: npm run build-storybook && docker run --rm --mount type=bind,source="$(pwd)"/.storybook,target=/.storybook --mount type=bind,source="$(pwd)"/src,target=/src --mount type=bind,source="$(pwd)"/storybook-static,target=/storybook-static tests-visual npx jest --config=visual.jest.config.js
scripts.test:visual-approve: docker run --rm --mount type=bind,source="$(pwd)"/.storybook,target=/.storybook --mount type=bind,source="$(pwd)"/src,target=/src --mount type=bind,source="$(pwd)"/storybook-static,target=/storybook-static tests-visual npx jest -u --config=visual.jest.config.js
scripts.test:visual-no-bundle: docker run --rm --mount type=bind,source="$(pwd)"/.storybook,target=/.storybook --mount type=bind,source="$(pwd)"/src,target=/src --mount type=bind,source="$(pwd)"/storybook-static,target=/storybook-static backoffice-visual npx jest --config=visual.jest.config.js && git add .storybook
scripts.test:visual-approve-no-bundle: docker run --rm --mount type=bind,source="$(pwd)"/.storybook,target=/.storybook --mount type=bind,source="$(pwd)"/src,target=/src --mount type=bind,source="$(pwd)"/storybook-static,target=/storybook-static backoffice-visual npx jest -u --config=visual.jest.config.js && git add .storybook
scripts.non-visual-checks: npm t && npm run lint && npm run check:types && npm run deps:validate
